per_frame_1=wave_b = max((1 / 3.14) + .5 * sin(time) - (2 / (3 * 3.14)) * cos(2 * time), .3);
per_frame_2=wave_g = .1 * max(5 * mid * sin(mid * time) / (mid_att * mid_att + mid * mid), .1);
per_frame_3=wave_r = max(5 * treb * sin(treb * time) / (treb_att * treb_att + treb * treb), .3);
per_frame_4=decay = .99999995 + .00000005 * abs(sin(50 * time));
per_pixel_1=zoom = if(below(rad, .03), .9, 1 - 2 * (-(3/2) * pow(2.718, sin(bass * bass * time * sin(31.4 * rad) / rad)) + .5 * pow(2.718, sin(treb * treb * time * rad * sin(3.14 * rad) / rad)))/500);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // custom motion for 50% of the pixels...:
warp_4=`    float2 uv2 = (uv_orig - 0.5)*0.91 + 0.5;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // make every other pixel use 'uv2':
warp_7=`    float2 pix = uv_orig * texsize.xy;
warp_8=`    float even_odd = saturate(2*frac((pix.x + pix.y)*0.5 + 0.25));
warp_9=`    uv = lerp(uv, uv2, even_odd);
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    // sample previous frame
warp_12=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_13=`    
warp_14=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_15=`    //ret = (ret - 0.0015)*0.988;
warp_16=`    ret *= 0.8 + 0.17*saturate(rad*5);
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*1 - GetBlur1(uv);
comp_4=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_5=`    float3 ret2 = tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz - GetBlur1(uv_echo);
comp_6=`    ret *= 4.5;
comp_7=`    ret2 *=4.5;
comp_8=`    ret = lerp(ret,ret2,0.50);
comp_9=`    ret *= (hue_shader*8)-7.25;
comp_10=`    ret *= 1.5;
comp_11=`}
